generated_body: The article likely discusses the life and legacy of the last known Pearl Harbor survivor in Massachusetts, who recently passed away at the age of 98. Readers can expect details about the individual’s experiences during the attack on Pearl Harbor, as well as insights into their life after the war. It may also touch on the significance of their passing in the context of preserving memories of World War II and the dwindling number of surviving veterans. The piece could provide reflections on the importance of remembering such historical events and the impact they had on American history.
